name: Operation Petra (Prototype)
description:
This was a prototype game i made for the #letscreatejam

You are a military psychic expert for operation petra.

P - Psychometry

E - ESP

T - Telepathy

R - Remote Viewing

A - Astral Projection

You have been tasked to go into the void dimension to find out what happend to the probe and the military team that was sent in.

There is no way to finish the level, it is just a prototype made for  game jam

Development for this game has been put on hold.
